text.text:
Below is the usage manual for how to use this bot. Get started using this app by mentioning the app like @Vehicle Reservation 'insert_command_here' in a channel that the bot is in. 
 An example command would be as follows : *@Vehicle Reservation help* 
 In this example this would display the usage manual for this bot.

Command 1 - *reserve* 
 Command used to reserve a vehicle.

Command 2 - *reservations* 
 Gets the reservations of a specific vehicle for today

Command 3 - *vehicles* 
 Lists all of the vehicles and checks if they are available

Command 4 - *check* 
 Checks if a vehicle is available from start-time to end-time
